articles.author: Wash N'Gog
articles.title: (Video) Bobby Firmino bags crucial goal for Brazil in Copa America clash - Empire of The Kop
articles.description: Liverpool striker Roberto Firmino scored an important goal for Brazil last night. The Canarinho beat Colombia 2-1 in the Copa America, despite going 1-0 down in the early stages. MORE: (Photo) New …
articles.content:
Liverpool striker Roberto Firmino scored an important goal for Brazil last night.
The Canarinho beat Colombia 2-1 in the Copa America, despite going 1-0 down in the early stages.
MORE: (Photo) New … [+354 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Strawberry supermoon: Last of night sky spectacles this year approaches - Sky News
articles.description: The event is called strawberry because it occurs during the period when the fruit is harvested in North America.

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Portugal vs. Francia, EN VIVO ONLINE por la Eurocopa: dónde y cómo verlo por internet en streaming y TV - Goal.com
articles.description: The 10 South American countries participating in the 2021 Copa America will be split up into two groups of five. The top four in each group will advance to the single-elimination knockout stage, which kicks off with the quarterfinals.
